chorus:
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
We are going to see the King!
verses:
Soon and very soon
we are going to
see the King!
Soon and very soon
we are going to
see the King!
Soon and very soon
we are going to
see the King!

No More Crying There,
We are going to
see the King!
No More Crying There,
We are going to
see the King!
No More Crying There,
We are going to
see the King!

No more dying there,
We are going to
see the King!
No more dying there,
We are going to
see the King!
No more dying there,
We are going to
see the King!
